job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the development of tools leveraging Generative AI, which falls under the modeling category as it involves creating and applying AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: improving our intelligent AI powered chat bot
job_tasks.justification: Improving an AI chatbot, especially one that uses internal documentation, implies working with and enhancing AI models, fitting the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing and implementing backend microservices in the AWS Cloud
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software development activities, focusing on designing and implementing backend services within a specific cloud environment.
Building systems that are high-performance and scalable is a fundamental aspect of software development and system design.

job_tasks.phrase: using AI chat bots instead of complex wizards in our S3 Passenger product for configuration
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the integration of AI chatbots into a product for user configuration, which is a software development task focused on user experience and functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating to design secure, high-quality, and maintainable software
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the design and development of software with an emphasis on quality, security, and maintainability.

job_tasks.phrase: Debugging and optimising systems using tools like New Relic, Sentry, and other monitoring platforms
job_tasks.justification: Debugging, optimizing systems, and using monitoring platforms are key aspects of operations engineering, particularly for ensuring the performance and stability of deployed applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with OpenTofu, Kubernetes, and AWS Cloud Development Kit to build Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Building Infrastructure-as-Code solutions using these tools is a software development practice focused on automating infrastructure management.

job_tasks.phrase: Work on a mission-critical SaaS platform used by international customers for inventory, reservation, and ticketing.
job_tasks.justification: Understanding the nature of the SaaS platform and its business functions (inventory, reservation, ticketing) demonstrates business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a team of passionate developers who are happy to share their knowledge and help you grow.
Collaborating to design secure, high-quality, and maintainable software.
Learn as you go: No prior AI experience? No problem. We'll provide the tools and mentorship you need to succeed.
Learn Python while applying it to meaningful, real-world projects.
Experiment with innovative technologies and shape the future of Generative AI in real-world applications.
improving our intelligent AI powered chat bot so users are able to find answers quickly based on our internal documentation.
Supportive culture: A company that values growth, creativity, and knowledge sharing.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing Generative AI-powered tools, improving AI chatbots, and specifically mentions using Anthropic Claude models via AWS Bedrock. It aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer by focusing on LLM applications and the software development required to deploy them.
